short_summary: This is a request for proposal for printing services
description: The client experience branch of IRCC has a need for printing services that include braille and large print documents as well as regular documents. The IRCC will be printing and distributing these documents to individuals who have difficulty accessing the internet or have mobility disabilities.
duration_in_months: >', companies are invited to submit proposals for the printing service. The latest round of Q&A's were published on May 5th, 2023.
full_summary:
Printing of Braille or Large Print Materials on an As-Needed Basis #
=============================================================

### Description

The Client Experience Branch of Immigration, Refugees, and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is seeking a contractor to provide printing services for braille or large print materials on an as-needed basis. The objective is to support IRCC clients who require paper versions of application kits, including instruction guides, application forms, and associated document checklists.

### Background

IRCC receives requests from the public for braille and large print materials in both English and French. While online availability of documents allows clients to print materials themselves, IRCC continues to offer printing and distribution services to support clients with specific needs.

### Service Requirements

The contractor will be responsible for printing braille or large print (18 points) materials on an as-needed basis. The services include:

1.  Printing instructional guides, application forms, and associated document checklists.
2.  Supporting clients who:
    *   Do not have access to the internet or a printer.
    *   Do not have family members or friends who can assist them.
    *   Have a mobility disability and are unable to access materials via an organization or business.
3.  Supporting clients residing in remote areas with limited or no internet access.

### Terms and Conditions

*   This service is subject to an as-needed basis, with no guarantees of regular orders.
*   IRCC will provide the necessary materials and templates for printing.
*   The contractor is responsible for ensuring that printed materials meet the required standards for braille and large print formats.

### Attachments

For more information, please refer to the following attachments:

<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4749/rfp_-_printing_services_-_cic-155624.pdf>
<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4749/qas-cic-155624---round-2.pdf>
<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4749/qas-cic-155624---round-1.pdf>

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or requests for clarification, please contact:

Manon Delorme
manon.delorme@cic.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000
